report.title: Came Out With More Than Sick
report.author: blazed
report.bodytext: About an hour or so ago - popped 150mg of tramadol (Ultram) hcl (three /n pills so far). /n /n 12:38pm (now) - popped one more to make it 200mg after reading up on the pills online a little bit. feeling mildly sedated but still up at /n the same time. i like this high a lot. i'm waiting for my /n friend to deliver my weed to me. i can't wait for the full 200mg /n to kick in so i can see what this stuff is all about. /n listening to The Futureheads and it sounds alright. i may be /n changing the music soon. /n /n 12:42pm - decide to change the music to Gnarls Barkley. definitely feeling the /n pills but i'm not used to them so i don't know what to be expecting /n or anything. i'm going to continue reading about the pills. the /n body high kind of feels like ecstasy. somewhat euphoric. mild /n jitters etc. /n /n 12:48 - my weed is here!! i'm going to roll up a skimp cigarillo and see if the /n weed heightens the high at all. i find myself making a lot of typing /n mistakes. finishing up a cigarette. thinking alot about Gnarls Barkley /n and how genious the group is. breaking up weed as i write this. /n /n 1am - blunt lit. hands were very clumsy and shaky while rolling it. it's very /n small but it will do the job. sweating mildly. very jittery. almost /n uncomfortable but the weed is chilling me out as i type this. /n /n 1:05 - blunt is becoming a roach. feeling very good. very very good. sedated. /n dreamy. very good. realizing tramadol and weed is a very very very very /n good combo. i may roll up another cigarillo in a little while if i'm /n feeling up to it. dazed. i fall into very deep dazes in with the music /n every once in a while. thinking about putting on some ambient/electronic /n music. hot hot heat is playing at the moment. feeling very lazy. /n /n 1:08 - Mouse on Mars - Idiology album begins. i put on a pair of stereo headphones at 1:10. feeling wild. music is very loud in the headphones. /n /n 1:14 - turn itunes visualizer on. the visualizer puts me in a daze. /n /n 1:17 - slightly numb in my mouth for some reason. i decide to put on a crazy /n song by rjd2. no more visualizer for now. very fucked up. smoking a /n cigarette. this report is going to be very interesting to read. i've /n been reading many reports similar to what is unfolding here. this drug /n ... tramadol.... i like this drug. although i got these pills for free.. /n i would, without a doubt, pay for more. they're very good. i just seem /n to keep getting more and more fucked up. I LOVE IT.. /n /n 1:21 - reading over my report so far. i like it. this is just getting started.. /n i can tell. RJD2 - 1976 is BANGIN' in my headphones. Ghostwriter by /n the same band begins... sounds very good. music is becoming a journey.. /n each song is a different journey. all the music i'm playing right now /n is instrumental/electronic. so no lyrics. i'm thinking about putting /n on some good rock. feeling very good. i go get a cup of water and /n turn the light off in my room at 1:25. /n /n 1:26 - Such Great Heights - The Postal Service begins... this music is so /n amazing. the heart put into the songs. the postal service is genious. /n the pills are great. but i'm just gonna let it flow from here on. the /n music causes tons of emotion.. it's all wonderful. i lovvvve this. closing /n eyes liping the lyrics. when i close my eyes the music flows through me. /n minor CEV's. my body is moving in all sorts of ways to the music. sort /n of dancing while sitting down. i don't dance. good feelings are all over /n the place at 1:29. /n /n 1:30 - brand new colony - the postal service begins... i IM a friend. mild /n nausia begins. the music is great. i like the faster pace of this track. /n there's no way i would want to drive on this drug/n note. /n drinking lots of water just to keep hydrated. /n /n 1:36 - explosions in the sky starts. i just changed into my night time clothes. /n feeling good but tired. debating whether to smoke more weed. myspace /n is a very very useful tool. one of the best thing's i've seen in the /n 2000's. the music is wonderful as usual. /n /n 1:43 - music is great. talking to two friends. feeling good. getting /n into deep conversation about drugs with one of my friends. almost /n coming down. i wanna smoke more weed. i don't feel like rolling a blunt. /n feeling dazed and tired but happy. the music is fueling me at the moment. /n /n 1:53 - i turn the light on to roll up a cigarillo but i'm trying a different /n method of rolling. (using joint roller). hoping it'll work. /n /n 2:01 - mini blunt lit. burning nice and slow. it's like a fat joint-sized /n cigar. rolled with perfection. it hits like a dream.i'm gonna be /n ripped. /n /n 2:07 - the blunt is almost done. i can't believe i just texted the girl of my /n dreams. /n /n 2:10 - blunt is done. i'm having a flirtatious text message conversation with the /n girl of my dreams. WHAT?! i'm for real. explosions in the sky is one /n of the best of all time. simple as that. i just felt a very euphoric /n feeling. it was very random. but it was welcomed once it came on. this /n drug is WILD. /n /n 2:14 - i spark up a cigarette. the album 'The Rescue' - Explosions in The Sky is /n one of the most emotional albums i have ever heard. this band has so /n much heart. i love finding REAL MUSIC. Day Three - explosions.... this /n track is unbelievable. i'm happy. almost ready for sleep. the cigarette /n is very good. camel lights are very rich. /n /n 2:18 - appreciatin' my cigs. lol. this drug is minorly similar to ecstasy which /n is unbelieveable. the marijuana jets this drug out of control... but i /n love it. this music is CRAZY. /n /n 2:21 - i've calmed down a lot since the beginning of this trip report. i like /n it a lot more now than i did then. my mind wonders easily now. but /n i can bring it back very fast. the music is still fueling me. this /n would be nothing without the music. the soundtrack to this night is /n classic because it made my night for me. /n /n 2:24 - i decide it's getting late and that it's almost time for sleep. it will /n come easily in the state i'm in at the moment. i'm on track five of an /n 8 track album. i think i'll finish it and go to sleep. i couldn't /n NOT finish this album. it's too good to be ended so quickly. i'm surprised /n music is this appreciated on this drug. i'm wondering if i'm one of /n few that have used this drug for it's opaiate ability and not just for /n back pain or if a lot of people use it for this. i love this drug. /n i'll defiitely come out of this trip with more kowledge... /n which is very good. i may or may not do these again. i have enough for /n two more trips equal dosage to the one i'm on now (200mg, four pills). /n as a side note i will mention that i broke the pills in half before /n i took them so the effects would come on quicker. just incase i forget /n that small bit. /n /n 2:30 - smoking a cigarette. this girl is so cute. i wish she was here next to /n me right now. on track 6 going on track 7 now. i tidy up my room a bit /n before laying down to go to sleep. flipped the light off in the begining /n of the seventh track. my legs feel kind of numb. i like it. laying down /n is gonna feel so good. mildly sweating. thinking about that girl that i /n can carry on a conversation so well with. /n /n 2:36 - begining of the last track of the album. this is about it for the night! /n i'm just gonna chill to this song. close my eyes and melt. the track is /n mildly upbeat. this it for the night. i'll update in the morning. /n /n 2:38 - i turn off the computer and lay down for sleep. the trip has been long /n and good. /n /n /n [next day] /n 12:07pm - i feel very worn down today. very lazy. these pills definitely come /n with a hang over. nothing too bad. but i can tell it's there. my /n morning has been bad because there's a kid that has been blowing up /n my phone since 8am and he has not stopped calling. i guess he needs a /n ride somewhere. but yeah, after a shower i'm hoping i won't feel so /n worn down and tired today. i'm going to read over my report from last /n night. /n /n 12:19 - falling asleep last night, from what i can remember, was very easy. i /n remember my body was twitching a lot. way way more than usual. the /n twitching was definitely caused by the pills. i kinda remember having /n minor CEVs before falling asleep which were kind of keeping me from /n completely relaxing. i'm really tired still. bout to get in the shower. /n /n 12:25 - i hop in the shower. /n /n 12:43 - exiting shower. realizing that i came out of this trip with a lot more /n than i originally thought i came out of it with. i'm having the urge /n to try something new! i want to impress someone or go to the beach or /n something i don't normally do! i want to adventure somewhere that i've /n never been. i have a feeling this trip has pushed me to try new things. /n i don't know why or how exactly... but i like it. still feeling mild /n effects. feeling refreshed after my shower. i feel motivated but tired. /n it's all good. i may or may not expiriment with these pills again soon. /n /n [EDIT!] /n 1:08pm - slight nausea led to projectile vomiting everything out of my stomach (just water). it was horrible but i feel better now. i hadnt eaten last night or this morning, so maybe now i'll eat something. i was not expecting that. /n /n 2:30 - first bit of food in 15 hours. slice of pizza. not much of an appetite but i know i need to eat. I'm basically forcing it down.
